basics.name: Declan Hong
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2018.

highlights: Performs routine clerical work; answer and attend to telephone calls; maintain record, operate office machines(such as copier), sort and distribute mail, issue keys and identity cards, act as messenger, and perform related tasks as required.
Performs clerical library work, sorting and shelving books, performing data entry into library systems, or binding books and periodicals.
Assists in instruction programs, including tutoring and assisting students in areas such as Mathematics, Accounting and Computer programming

Operate, repair, and perform maintenance on mechanical components of two LM 2500 Gas Turbine Engines, main propulsion machinery(including gears, shafts, and controllable pitch propellers),assigned auxiliary equipment and propulsion control system.

Align Low Pressure Air Compressors and fuel oil tanks; analyzes fuel oil samples; fabricates sealing gasket; Assist in start up, operation and shutdown of engines and electrical pumps. Monitor plant operational status and maintain a log record.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013
